resources.string: Don't notify of future leakages of this category
In the following dialog box, choose the file that contains all keywords that PrivacyLeakDetection should look for in the network traffic.
Are you sure you want to export data? This will export all database tables into CSV files (one CSV file for each table).

To use PrivacyLeakDetection, you need to turn on all permissions that it requires.

For example, if PrivacyLeakDetection cannot learn your location, it cannot look for leaks of your location in traffic that is leaving your device.

PrivacyLeakDetection uses the information that you grant it access to only locally and does not transmit it to remote entities.
Are you sure you want to delete all the data that PrivacyLeakDetection has recorded for %s? This action cannot be undone.
The order to display application leakages.
The size of the leak report graph domain.

To use PrivacyLeakDetection, you need to give it usage acccess.\n\nOtherwise, PrivacyLeakDetection cannot determine whether an app leaked your personal information while being in the foreground or while being in the background.
Your current Android version is: %d.\nYou need at least version %d to use this feature.
This graph shows when your app is leaking compared to when it is in the foreground or background. Use the navigation arrows to move forward and backward in time.
A summary of the leaks of your app, by category and foreground status.
Set the parameters as you wish in order to investigate when and what your app has been leaking.
This graph shows when your apps are leaking. Use the navigation arrows to move forward and backward in time.
A summary of the leaks of all your apps, by category and foreground status.
Set the parameters as you wish in order to investigate when and what your apps have been leaking.
A summary of the traffics of your app, by encryption and direction.
A summary of the traffics of all your apps, by encryption and direction.

In order for PrivacyLeakDetection to inspect encrypted traffic, it needs to add a certificate to your device\'s certificate store. This requires that you enter your device\'s PIN and click the \"OK\" button when asked to name the certificate.
